ports.name: audio in
ports.text: The audio signal you want to make more silent / louder

ports.name: gain
ports.text: Amount of gain to apply, `0` = not audible, `1` = output will be as loud as the input signal, everything bigger than `1` will make the audio signal louder.

ports.name: audio out
ports.text: Audio output which contains the the input signal with the gain applied, can be connected to the Ops.WebAudio.Output op e.g.
